description:
We work with most popular mobile platforms – iOS и Android, use cross-platform solutions as well as solutions from the leading software developers. We are driven by the end result and strive to implement each business task accurately and in most optimal way.
Our mission is to use the most innovative methods and technologies. By following up the latest developments in the apps market we always forestall our customers' expectations. That is why our applications are so powerful and memorable.
Our proud: «Appreal Guides»
What is «Appreal Guides» - a unique platform made to help you in creating mobile guides through various locations, services or events. Our solution has all the important user functions and provides powerful capabilities on connecting your targeted audience.
Content Management System - highly functional and flexible administrative panel gives you the opportunity to manage the content remotely in user's gadgets, create new layers, selections & tags, helps you in adding and editing information on objects, services and events without any need in updating the guide in the app stores.
Analytics - built-in analytics system will inform you about user activity in your application, number of views of the guide screens, click-through, changing sections, opening help pages, and sessions lenght.
